languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} available only to psykers. They allow psykers to reach into the warp and use it in various ways. Just like normal abilities, they are used in combat, can be taken when levelling up (instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities), and some of them can be considered attacks. The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between reality and the warp. The worse the degradation, the higher the chance psychic powers will trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or even {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Психосилы{/g} — это уникальные {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, доступные только псайкерам. Применяя их, псайкеры черпают энергию варпа и используют ее для различных целей. Как и обычные способности, психосилы применяются в бою, могут быть выбраны при повышении уровня персонажа (вместо способностей {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипов{/g}), и некоторые из них считаются атаками. Основное отличие психосил от обычных способностей в том, что психосилы могут быть освоены только псайкерами, разделены на отдельные дисциплины, а их применение истончает {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}завесу{/g} между реальным миром и варпом. Чем больше истончена завеса, тем выше шанс того, что применение психосил вызовет {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g} или даже {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозу варпа{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Psychic powers are special abilities available only to psykers. They allow psykers to reach into the warp and use it in various ways. Just like normal abilities, they are used in combat, can be taken when levelling up (instead of doctrine abilities), and some of them can be considered attacks. The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the veil between reality and the warp. The worse the degradation, the higher the chance psychic powers will trigger psychic phenomena or even perils of the warp.

{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} available only to psykers. The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between reality and the warp. The worse the degradation, the higher the chance psychic powers will trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or even {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between reality and the warp. traits.locale_text: Психосилы — это уникальные способности, доступные только псайкерам. Применяя их, псайкеры черпают энергию варпа и используют ее для различных целей. Как и обычные способности, психосилы применяются в бою, могут быть выбраны при повышении уровня персонажа (вместо способностей доктрин), и некоторые из них считаются атаками. Основное отличие психосил от обычных способностей в том, что психосилы могут быть освоены только псайкерами, разделены на отдельные дисциплины, а их применение истончает завесу между реальным миром и варпом. Чем больше истончена завеса, тем выше шанс того, что применение психосил вызовет пси-морок или даже угрозу варпа.

Психосилы — это уникальные способности, доступные только псайкерам. Применяя их, псайкеры черпают энергию варпа и используют ее для различных целей. Как и обычные способности, психосилы применяются в бою, могут быть выбраны при повышении уровня персонажа (вместо способностей доктрин), и некоторые из них считаются атаками. Основное отличие психосил от обычных способностей в том, что психосилы могут быть освоены только псайкерами, разделены на отдельные дисциплины, а их применение истончает завесу между реальным миром и варпом. Чем больше истончена завеса, тем выше шанс того, что применение психосил вызовет пси-морок или даже угрозу варпа.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psionische Kräfte{/g} sind besondere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, die nur Psioniker haben. Sie ermöglichen es Psionikern, in den Warp zu greifen und ihn auf verschiedene Weise zu nutzen. Genau wie normale Fähigkeiten werden sie im Kampf eingesetzt, können beim Stufenaufstieg übernommen werden (anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g}-Fähigkeiten), und einige von ihnen kann man auch als Angriffe ansehen. Der Hauptunterschied zu den normalen Fähigkeiten besteht darin, dass sie nur von einem Psioniker erlernt werden können, dass sie in besondere Disziplinen unterteilt sind und dass ihre Anwendung den {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Schleier{/g} zwischen der Realität und dem Warp schwächt. Je stärker dieser Zerfall ist, desto höher ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass psionische Kräfte {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionische Phänomene{/g} oder sogar {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} auslösen.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} available only to psykers. They allow psykers to reach into the warp and use it in various ways. Just like normal abilities, they are used in combat, can be taken when levelling up (instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities), and some of them can be considered attacks. The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between reality and the warp. The worse the degradation, the higher the chance psychic powers will trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or even {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}Psionische Kräfte{/g} sind besondere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, die nur Psioniker haben. Sie ermöglichen es Psionikern, in den Warp zu greifen und ihn auf verschiedene Weise zu nutzen. Genau wie normale Fähigkeiten werden sie im Kampf eingesetzt, können beim Stufenaufstieg übernommen werden (anstelle von Doktrin-Fähigkeiten), und einige von ihnen kann man auch als Angriffe ansehen. Der Hauptunterschied zu den normalen Fähigkeiten besteht darin, dass sie nur von einem Psioniker erlernt werden können, dass sie in besondere Disziplinen unterteilt sind und dass ihre Anwendung den Schleier zwischen der Realität und dem Warp verschlechtert. Je stärker dieser Zerfall ist, desto höher ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass psionische Kräfte {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionische Phänomene{/g} oder sogar {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} auslösen.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} sont des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} spéciales réservées aux psykers. Ils leur permettent d'accéder au Warp et de l'utiliser de diverses manières. À l'image des capacités ordinaires, ils sont utilisés lors des combats, peuvent être choisis lorsque le personnage accède au niveau supérieur (à la place des capacités d'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g}), et certains peuvent être considérés comme des attaques. Cependant, contrairement aux capacités ordinaires, ils ne peuvent être choisis que par un psyker, se décomposent en disciplines spécifiques, et leur utilisation dégrade le {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}voile{/g} séparant la réalité du Warp. Plus la dégradation est importante, plus les pouvoirs psychiques risquent de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g}, voire des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} available only to psykers. They allow psykers to reach into the warp and use it in various ways. Just like normal abilities, they are used in combat, can be taken when levelling up (instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities), and some of them can be considered attacks. The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between reality and the warp. The worse the degradation, the higher the chance psychic powers will trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or even {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} sont des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} spéciales réservées aux psykers. Ils permettent à ceux-ci d'accéder au Warp et de l'utiliser de diverses manières. Tout comme les capacités ordinaires, ils sont utilisés lors des combats, peuvent être choisis lorsque le personnage accède au niveau supérieur (à la place des capacités associées à la doctrine), et certains d'entre eux peuvent être considérés comme des attaques. Mais contrairement aux capacités ordinaires, ils ne peuvent être choisis que par un psyker, se décomposent en disciplines spécifiques, et leur utilisation dégrade le voile séparant la réalité du Warp. Plus la dégradation est importante, plus les pouvoirs psychiques risquent de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g}, voire des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}是特殊的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，只有灵能者才能使用。灵能者可以潜入亚空间之中，汲取亚空间的力量为自己所有。灵能能力与普通能力一样，可以在战斗中使用，也可以在升级的时候学习（灵能者可以选择不学习{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}能力）。部分灵能能力会被视为攻击。灵能能力与普通能力的主要区别是：灵能能力只能由灵能者学习，灵能能力分为许多不同的派系，且使用灵能能力会削弱真实世界与亚空间之间的{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁{/g}。障壁恶化程度越严重，灵能能力就越有可能触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}，甚至触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} available only to psykers. They allow psykers to reach into the warp and use it in various ways. Just like normal abilities, they are used in combat, can be taken when levelling up (instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities), and some of them can be considered attacks. The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between reality and the warp. The worse the degradation, the higher the chance psychic powers will trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or even {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能力量{/g}是特殊的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，只有灵能者才能使用。灵能者可以潜入亚空间之中，汲取亚空间的力量为自己所有。灵能力量与普通能力一样，可以在战斗中使用，也可以在升级的时候学习（灵能者可以选择不学习信条能力）。部分灵能能力会被视为攻击。灵能力量与普通能力的主要区别是：灵能力量只能由灵能者学习，灵能力量分为许多不同的派系，且使用灵能力量会削弱真实世界与亚空间之间的障壁。障壁恶化程度越严重，灵能能力触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}，甚至触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}的几率就越高。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} son {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} especiales disponibles solo para psíquicos. Permiten que los psíquicos contacten con la disformidad y la usen de diversas maneras. Al igual que las capacidades normales, se usan en combate, se eligen al subir de nivel (en vez de capacidades de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g}) y algunas cuentan como ataques. Las principales diferencias respecto a las capacidades normales es que son exclusivas de los psíquicos, se dividen en disciplinas únicas y usarlas desgasta el {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}velo{/g} que separa la realidad y la disformidad. Cuanto mayor sea la degradación, más probable es que los poderes psíquicos provoquen {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} e incluso {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} available only to psykers. They allow psykers to reach into the warp and use it in various ways. Just like normal abilities, they are used in combat, can be taken when levelling up (instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities), and some of them can be considered attacks. The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between reality and the warp. The worse the degradation, the higher the chance psychic powers will trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or even {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} son {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} especiales disponibles solo para psíquicos. Permiten que los psíquicos contacten con la disformidad y la usen de diversas maneras. Al igual que las capacidades normales, se usan en combate, se eligen al subir de nivel (en vez de capacidades de doctrina) y algunas cuentan como ataques. Las principales diferencias respecto a las capacidades normales es que son exclusivas de los psíquicos, se dividen en disciplinas únicas y usarlas desgasta el velo que separa la realidad y la disformidad. Cuanto mayor sea la degradación, más probable es que los poderes psíquicos provoquen {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} e incluso {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.

languages.original_text: Psychic Powers are special abilities available only to the psykers. They allow the psyker to reach into the warp and use it in various ways. Just like normal abilities they are used in combat, can be taken at level-ups (instead of doctrine abilities) and some of them count as an attack. Their main difference from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into disciplines, and using them degrades the veil between reality and the warp, and they may trigger Psychic Phenomena or even Perils of the warp.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は特別な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で、異能者のみが使用できる。このために異能者は<歪み>に近づき、様々な方法で利用できる。通常のアビリティと同様、戦闘で使用し、({g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}アビリティの代わりに)レベルアップの際に獲得し、一部は攻撃とみなされる。通常のアビリティとの主な違いとして、異能者のみが獲得できること、独自の規律に分けられること、使用すると現実と<歪み>の間にある{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェール{/g}の劣化につながることが挙げられる。劣化が進むにつれて、超能力が{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}またはもっと悪いことに{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}のトリガーとなる確率が高まる。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} available only to psykers. They allow psykers to reach into the warp and use it in various ways. Just like normal abilities, they are used in combat, can be taken when levelling up (instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities), and some of them can be considered attacks. The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between reality and the warp. The worse the degradation, the higher the chance psychic powers will trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or even {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}は特別な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で、異能者のみが使用できる。このために異能者は<歪み>に近づき、様々な方法で利用できる。通常のアビリティと同様、戦闘で使用し、レベルアップの際に(ドクトリン アビリティの代わりに)獲得でき、その一部は攻撃とみなされる。通常のアビリティとの主な違いとして、異能者のみが獲得できること、独自の規律に分けられること、使用すると現実と<歪み>の間にあるヴェールの劣化につながることが挙げられる。劣化が進むほど、超能力が{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}またはもっと悪いことに{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}のトリガーとなる確率が高まる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Ruhsezi güçleri{/g}, ruhsezerlere has özel {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} lerdir. Ruhsezerlerin öteboyuta erişip ondan çeşitli şekillerde yararlanmalarına olanak tanır. Tıpkı normal kabiliyetlerde olduğu gibi çatışmada kullanılabilir ve karakter seviye atlarken ({g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketip{/g} kabiliyetleri yerine) öğrenilebilirler. Ayrıca içlerinden bazıları saldırı olarak kabul edilir. Normal kabiliyetlerden temel farkları; yalnızca ruhsezerlerce öğrenilebilmeleri, farklı farklı disiplinlere ayrılmaları ve onları kullanmanın gerçeklikle öteboyut arasındaki {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}örtüyü{/g} bozmasıdır. Bu bozulma ne kadar kötüleşirse ruhsezi güçlerinin {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}ruhsezi fenomenlerini{/g}, hatta {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetikleme olasılıkları da o kadar yükselir.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} available only to psykers. They allow psykers to reach into the warp and use it in various ways. Just like normal abilities, they are used in combat, can be taken when levelling up (instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities), and some of them can be considered attacks. The main differences from normal abilities is that they can only be taken by a psyker, are separated into unique disciplines, and using them will degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between reality and the warp. The worse the degradation, the higher the chance psychic powers will trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or even {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
